page.title: 17Social Concerns.
page.content:
In the past months two items have been prominent in the iocal paper letter pages.Opencast Mining and Local Nuclear Power Stations.We worked out a questionaire that Emma Rainer gave to a hundred children at Yorkley School, to ask their parents.
1. Should opencast mining be allowed to take place at Oakenhill on the edge of this village? Results:_ Yes 36% No 64%
2.Do you feel that an enquiry is needed into possible pollution from the 4 Severn Nuclear Power Stations? Results:_ Yes 92% No 8%.
